metadata.title: CVE-2023-30086 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Libtiff V.4.0.7 allows a localattacker to cause a denial of service via the tiffcp function in tiffcp.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-30086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm7
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm7
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm7
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.8+esm7').
